Arrays.title: Find the Largest Number in an Array
Arrays.description: function findMaxNumber(arr) { let max = arr[0]; for (let i = 1; i < arr.length; i++) { if (arr[i] > max) { max = arr[i]; } } return max; }

Arrays.title: Removing duplicats from an Array
Arrays.description: let wizards = ['Merlin','Ursula','Gandalf','Merlin','Morgana,'Radagast',  'Ursula']; let deduped = Array.from(new Set(wizards));

Arrays.title: Sorting an Array
Arrays.description: const arr = [44, 81, 23, 2, 64, 25, 100]; const sortArr = arr.sort((a, b) => b - a); console.log(sortArr);

Objects.title: Converting an object into a query string
Objects.description:
let merlin = {job: 'Wizard',tool: 'Wand', age: 142,signatureSpell 'Dancing Teacups'};
let queryString = new URLSearchParams(merlin).toString();

Strings.title: Check if a String is a Palindrome
Strings.description:
function isPalindrome(str) { const reversed = str.split('').reverse().join(''); 
return str === reversed; }

Utilities.title: Mask Numbers
Utilities.description: const fullNum = '8937498274283749328474983742'; const last8Dgtls = fullNum.slice(-8); const maskedNum = last8Dgtls.padStart(fullNum.length, '*') console.log(maskedNum);
